name: VampShift: The Bloodening
description:
VampShift: The Bloodening is a platform game in which you shapeshift into a bat to get through each room.

Made in C with SDL2, SDL2_image and SDL2_mixer

An HTML5 web version is now also available at https://abaines.me.uk/ld35

Source code:https://github.com/baines/ld35
